about_the_game:
Liberators' Chronicles is a historical, turn-based strategy game that immerses you in the epic South American independence campaigns of the 19th century. Drawing inspiration from actual historical documents—such as battle reports, letters, and memoirs of key figures, bringing to life the struggles and triumphs of the region’s most famous revolutionary leaders.

Experience thrilling cinematic clashes with infantry, cavalry, artillery, and naval troops as you navigate a rich variety of South American landscapes. From dense jungles to highland cities, every terrain and biome offers unique strategic opportunities. With hex-based grid maps of varying heights and challenging elevation mechanics, every decision you make can turn the tide of battle.

Key Features:

  • Historically Grounded Campaigns: Engage in missions based on real historical events that span on over 40 levels.

  • Multiple Unit Types: Among the main 4 unit-categories you’ll be able to command up to 19 squad sub-classes and dozens of historical regiments and battalions. 

  • Cinematic Combat: Watch your troops clash in turn-based battles with dynamic animations and cinematic sequences, where every move matters and every victory feels earned.

  • Hex Grid with Elevation Mechanics: Plan your strategy across challenging terrains with elevation elements that affect movement, line of sight, artillery range and tactics.

  • Hero Units with Unique Abilities: Lead legendary figures like Simón Bolívar, José de San Martín, and Juana Azurduy, each with special abilities that can turn the tide of a battle.

  • Distinctive Art Style: Enjoy a visually unique presentation that combines realistic historical settings with artistic flair, offering a refreshing take on historical strategy.

  • Thorough Historical Accuracy: The game faithfully recreates the uniforms, flags, and architecture of the time, ensuring an authentic visual experience.

  • Diverse Representation: The squads in Liberators' Chronicles reflect the diverse ethnicities and wide range of participants in the independence campaigns, from indigenous warriors to Afro-descendants and European-born officers. The game also highlights the varied ages of combatants, with young heroes among the ranks whose courage and resilience players can identify with.

Historical Setting:

Set during the pivotal South American independence struggles, Liberators' Chronicles allows you to step into the shoes of some of the most influential figures of the time, leading armies in their fight for freedom from colonial rule. The game's narrative is deeply rooted in actual historical events as every mission brings you closer to understanding the political and personal struggles that defined this era.

The game also emphasizes the diverse composition of the armies, showcasing the wide range of participants who contributed to the independence movements. You’ll command not only famous leaders but also the young, the old, and the often-overlooked ethnic groups who played a key role in these wars.

Gameplay:

In Liberators' Chronicles, you’ll command a variety of units, including infantry, cavalry, artillery, and naval forces, across a diverse range of maps that represent different South American biomes and cities. The hex-based grid system, with elevation-based mechanics, adds depth to every battle, as terrain plays a crucial role in tactics.

Each squad is made up of soldiers from a variety of ethnic backgrounds, reflecting the true diversity of the independence wars. You’ll also control legendary heroes, each with their own special abilities—whether it's Bolívar’s inspiring presence or San Martín’s tactical genius—that can tip the scales of battle in your favor.

The game's focus on historical authenticity extends to the representation of soldiers’ uniforms, flags, and architectural styles. Every detail, from the color of a regiment’s flag to the layout of a colonial fortress, has been carefully researched to deliver a visually immersive experience that’s as educational as it is thrilling.

Why You’ll Love It:

Liberators' Chronicles stands out with its combination of historical depth, tactical complexity, and cinematic battles. If you’re a fan of strategy games that not only challenge your intellect but also immerse you in a richly detailed historical world, this game is for you. With its focus on diverse participation and real historical figures, you’ll feel connected to the stories of young heroes and seasoned leaders alike, all while navigating the thrilling, high-stakes campaigns of South American independence.

The game's visually unique art style and commitment to historical accuracy ensure a deeply immersive experience, where you can appreciate the bravery of both famous generals and unsung heroes of the revolution. Whether you're a history enthusiast or a lover of tactical strategy, Liberators' Chronicles offers a fresh and impactful take on the turn-based strategy genre.

name: Liberators' Chronicles
short_description: Liberators' Chronicles is an exciting turn-based strategy game that will take you to the South American independence campaigns. Liberate half a continent from the yoke of the Spanish crown as you command brave revolutionary leaders and their armies.
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
